0.1.name: wordpress/simple-slideshow-builder
0.1.description:
A simple slideshow builder that uses a short code to easily place onto your website! After installing make sure you change the slideshow settings for it to display properly!

*Features
** Up to 10 Images
** Customizable descriptions
** Customizable width
** Background color
** Content for images!
** 2 Different Slideshow Layouts! :D
** and more! :D
